_description: On avoiding sin — one couplet paraphrasing ‘Tu caueas caueas ne perias per eas’, which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Fle þe dich of senneÞat þu fal nouth
                    þerinne
